languages.text: "В подобных случаях договоренности обязывали нас обратиться к Леди Теодоре. Она выступала ключевым лицом в поддержании {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Лекс Империалис{/g} в Просторе Коронус".

"Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} in the Koronus Expanse."
languages.original_text: "В подобных случаях договоренности обязывали нас обратиться к Леди Теодоре. Она выступала ключевым лицом в поддержании {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Лекс Империалис{/g} в Просторе Коронус".

traits.locale_text: "Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the Lex Imperialis in the Koronus Expanse."
"Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the Lex Imperialis in the Koronus Expanse."
"Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the Lex Imperialis in the Koronus Expanse."

"Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} in the Koronus Expanse."

"Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} in the Koronus Expanse."

languages.text: «Antes, unas circunstancias como estas nos habrían obligado a acudir a lady Theodora, tal y como estipulaba nuestro acuerdo. Fue una figura clave para asegurar el cumplimiento de la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} en la Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: "Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Antes, unas circunstancias como estas nos habrían obligado a acudir a lady Theodora, tal y como estipulaba nuestro acuerdo. Fue una figura clave para asegurar el cumplimiento de la Lex Imperialis en la Extensión de Koronus».

languages.text: “之前也发生过类似的情况，而我们被迫向西奥多拉夫人求助。在整个科罗努斯扩区，西奥多拉夫人是积极维护{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}帝国律法{/g}的重要人物。”
languages.original_text: "Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “之前也发生过类似的情况，而我们被迫向西奥多拉夫人求助。在整个科罗努斯扩区，西奥多拉夫人是积极维护帝国律法的重要人物。”

languages.text: « Par le passé, dans de telles circonstances, notre arrangement avec dame Théodora aurait voulu que nous nous tournions vers elle. C'était une figure clé du maintien de la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} à travers les Étendues de Koronus. »
languages.original_text: "Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Par le passé, dans de telles circonstances, notre arrangement avec dame Théodora aurait voulu que nous nous tournions vers elle. C'était une figure clé du maintien de la Lex Imperialis à travers les Étendues de Koronus. »

languages.text: 「過去の似たような状況では、私たちの取り決めによりレディ・シオドーラに頼らざるを得ませんでした。彼女は、コロヌス・エクスパンスの{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}レックス・インペリア{/g}を支援する上で重要な存在でした」
languages.original_text: "Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「過去の似たような状況では、私たちの取り決めによりレディ・シオドーラに頼らざるを得ませんでした。彼女は、コロヌス・エクスパンスのレックス・インペリアを支援する上で重要な存在でした」

languages.text: "Geçmişte benzer koşullarda anlaşmamız, bizi Leydi Theodora'ya başvurmak zorunda bırakmıştı. Koronus Enginliği'nde {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex İmperialis{/g}'i destekleyen önemli isimlerdendi."
languages.original_text: "Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Geçmişte benzer koşullarda anlaşmamız, bizi Leydi Theodora'ya başvurmak zorunda bırakmıştı. Koronus Enginliği'nde Lex İmperialis'i destekleyen önemli isimlerdendi."

languages.text: "In der Vergangenheit wären wir unter vergleichbaren Umständen verpflichtet gewesen, uns an Lady Theodora zu wenden. Sie war eine Schlüsselfigur bei der Umsetzung des {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperia{/g} in der Koronus-Ausdehnung."
languages.original_text: "Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialisGlossary}Lex Imperialis{/g} in the Koronus Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "In der Vergangenheit wären wir unter vergleichbaren Umständen verpflichtet gewesen, uns an Lady Theodora zu wenden. Sie war eine Schlüsselfigur bei der Umsetzung des Lex Imperia in der Koronus-Ausdehnung."

languages.original_text: "Under similar circumstances in the past, our arrangement would have obliged us to turn to Lady Theodora. She was a key figure in supporting the Lex Imperialis in the Koronus Expanse."
